## Xml.textToDom() function

Converts an XML string into a DOM structure.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function textToDom(text: string): Element;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  text | string | An XML string.  A DOM object representing the singular child of the document element. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Element

## Exceptions

if the text doesn't parse.  Blockly.Xml.textToDom
